subject: connection issue
description_text:
Hi ,

I installed the haptic motor , everything is fine in the simsonn software,
but doesn’t work in Iracing .

Can you help me with this please

conversations.body_text: Hi Charles Jobin,    Our software currently supports 10 racing games, and telemetry support for iRacing and LMU will be released next week. We will continue to expand support for more games in the future.  In the meantime, you can use the internal test version of SimHub we provided. The official release is still under testing and may take a bit more time.     https://drive.google.com/file/d/1p5kEGqiBUoGbt3qYI03tZ0NQ1VuhzOgv/view

Awesome, thanks for the info!

Le sam. 28 juin 2025 à 21:26, service@simsonn.com

Your service is awesome, everything is fine now

thank you very much

Le sam. 28 juin 2025 à 21:28, Charles Jobin <jobin0621@gmail.com> a écrit :

> Awesome, thanks for the info!
>
> Le sam. 28 juin 2025 à 21:26, service@simsonn.com
